author: jvanzyl
msg: There is now a set of properties that are pushed into the ant project
instead of doing it manually. Eventually we can get this list from a
properties file that is stored in the JAR.
We use the BeanMap from the commons-collections to turn the maven project
bean into a Map and use that with the property names. Less maintenance, can
become an SCM issue and not a programmatic one.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Making the standard gump file gump.xml
Adding maven.local.repo and maven.remote.repo. This will supercede lib.repo
so that we can store any project artifacts we want. Right now I need jars
and project descriptors for the reactor but we could easily accommodate
distributions and indexed javadoc bundles.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Ant build file used to generate a reactor.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Move toward making the targets more discreet in prep for mr pluggo
mechanism.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Apply patch submitted by Brian Leonard <brian@brainslug.org>:
it makes jxr more like the javadoc task, such that you can use src.set or
src.dir.  it xrefs into the same directory hierarchy as javadocs to make
linking saner
makes jxr use the ${javadoc.destdir} property.  before it was just
assuming javadocs were in a specific directory.
adds a jxr.destdir property
